{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arcadyan |model=WA9117A |revision=AC23-99 (R01) |est_release_date=11/14/2014 |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_id=K7SF9K1118V2 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47081A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635FMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GC16EWXD-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;747, 649E, 447;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;3; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-AC Dual-Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=153&prod2id=180 Product page] (WG9117G-AC) "P/N:141911723099J R01" is silkscreened on the main [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1969917 board]. :See also [[Belkin F9K1118 v2]] and [[Belkin F9K1118 v1]].. {{WiFiCert|WFA56289|11/14/2014}} ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=63937 ''Arcadyan WA9117AAC23'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://gathering.tweakers.net/forum/list_messages/1631435/0 ''Arcadyan WA9117AAC23'' on '''Tweakers''' forums] ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|boot log (firmware 001.007.76) |
